title: Spectator Hustings: Penny Mordaunt, Rishi Sunak and Liz Truss
description: One of Penny Mordaunt, Rishi Sunak or Liz Truss will be Britain's next prime minister. What are the contenders' answers to the big questions facing Britain? Isabel Hardman spoke to Mordaunt (00:36), Sunak (21:17) and Truss (42:15).
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
